pullrequest.title: Update control sync tutorial sample code and launch file to work with atlas v4/v5

content.raw:
Same problem with rqt_plot.

One minor question: I could not find the rxplot nor the ros-indigo-rx package. In fact, I believe that [groovy was the latest release supporting rxtools](http://wiki.ros.org/rx). We are pointing to them on the tutorial.

We should probably find a good way of making multiple plots with rqt. Maybe @dirk-thomas can help us with some hint about how to make multiple plots in rqt_plot for trying to get the same than in the old rxplot: #!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/raw/default/drcsim_control_sync/files/Sync_stats.png
content.html:
Same problem with rqt_plot.

One minor question: I could not find the rxplot nor the ros-indigo-rx package. In fact, I believe that groovy was the latest release supporting rxtools. We are pointing to them on the tutorial.

We should probably find a good way of making multiple plots with rqt. Maybe @dirk-thomas can help us with some hint about how to make multiple plots in rqt_plot for trying to get the same than in the old rxplot: #!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/raw/default/drcsim_control_sync/files/Sync_stats.png
